name: Consume Magic

name: Contract Conjurer
text: Costs (3) less for each Secret you control.
flavorText: This document looks illegally binding.

name: Convert
text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.

name: Convincing Disguise

name: Convincing Infiltrator

name: Convoke the Spirits

name: Cookie the Cook

name: Coordinated Strike
text: Summon three 1/1 Illidari with Rush.
flavorText: Undisputed champions of "Dancing with the Satyrs."

name: Coordinated Strike
text: Summon three 1/1 Illidari with Rush.
flavorText: Undisputed champions of "Dancing with the Satyrs."

name: Coppertail Imposter

name: Copycat
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of the next card your opponent plays to your hand.
flavorText: Whatever you do, DON’T let two of them meet.

name: Coral Keeper
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/3 Elemental for each spell school you've cast this game.
flavorText: This here is Carl. They're in charge of these elementals. Not all of them get along, so sometimes Carl corrals the quarreling coral.

name: Core Hound
flavorText: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

name: Core Hound
flavorText: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

name: Core Rager

flavorText: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.

name: Cornelius Roame

name: Cornered Sentry

name: Coroner

flavorText: It was at this moment the Coroner decided to become a farmer instead.

name: Corporal
text: Honorable Kill: Give your other minions Divine Shield.
flavorText: When he’s sitting in the graveyard ready to rez, he’s incorporal.

name: Corpse Bride
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 10 Corpses. Summon a Risen Groom with stats equal to the amount spent.

name: Corpse Explosion
text: Detonate a Corpse to deal 1 damage to all minions. If any are still alive, repeat this.
flavorText: What? It's not like they were using them anymore.

name: Corpse Raiser
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavorText: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

name: Corpse Widow
text: Your Deathrattle cards cost (2) less.

name: Corpsetaker

name: Corridor Creeper

name: Corrosive Breath
text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, it also hits the enemy hero.
flavorText: It's a breath of fresh terror!

name: Corrosive Sludge
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

name: Corrupt Elementalist
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond twice.
flavorText: Her element is "Horns."

name: Corrupt the Waters

flavorText: This is why Hagatha is banned from public pools.

name: Corrupted Ashbringer
text: Lifesteal
flavorText: Put your faith in the blight!

name: Corrupted Healbot
text: Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".

name: Corrupted Seer
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
flavorText: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

name: Corrupting Mist
text: Curse all minions. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
flavorText: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

name: Corruption
text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
flavorText: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM! Corrupted!

name: Corruption
text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
flavorText: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM! Corrupted!

flavorText: INGREDIENTS: STAR-STUFF, BLUE 1, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS.

name: Counterfeit Blade
text: Battlecry: Gain a random friendly Deathrattle that triggered this game.

name: Counterfeit Coin
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavorText: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavorText: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavorText: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Crabrider
text: Rush Windfury

name: Crackle
text: Deal 3- 6 damage. Overload: (1)

text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.

text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.

text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.

text: Overheal: Draw a card.

name: Crimson Clergy
text: Overheal: Draw a card.

name: Crypt Keeper

name: Crypt Lord

name: Crystalsong Portal

name: Crystalweaver

name: Crystology

name: Cult Apothecary

name: Cult Master
text: After a friendly minion dies, draw a card.
flavorText: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

name: Cult Master
text: After a friendly minion dies, draw a card.

name: Cult Neophyte

name: Cumulo-Maximus
text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.

name: Curio Collector
text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.

name: Curse of Agony
text: Shuffle three Agonies into the opponent's deck. They deal Fatigue damage when drawn.

name: Curse of Weakness

name: Cursed Blade
text: Double all damage dealt to your hero.

name: Cursed Castaway

name: Cursed Disciple
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.

name: Cursed Vagrant

name: Cutlass Courier

name: Cutpurse

name: Cutthroat Buccaneer

name: Cutting Class

name: Cybertech Chip
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Mech to your hand."

name: Cycle of Hatred

name: Cyclopian Horror

name: DJ Manastorm

name: DOOM!
text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.

name: Da Undatakah

name: Dalaran Aspirant

name: Dalaran Crusader
text: Divine Shield

name: Dalaran Librarian
text: Battlecry: Silence adjacent minions.

name: Dalaran Mage
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

name: Dalaran Mage

name: Dancing Cobra
text: Corrupt: Gain Poisonous.

name: Dancing Swords

name: Dar'Khan Drathir

name: Daring Drake
text: Rush Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: First of all, how dare you? Second of all, how dare you!

name: Daring Escape
text: Return all friendly minions to your hand.
flavorText: Impossible to cast without cackling evilly.

name: Daring Fire-Eater
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn deals 2 more damage.

name: Daring Reporter

name: Dark Alley Pact

name: Dark Arakkoa

name: Dark Cultist

name: Dark Inquisitor Xanesh

name: Dark Iron Dwarf
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.

name: Dark Iron Dwarf
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.

name: Dark Iron Skulker

name: Dark Pact

name: Dark Skies

name: Dark Wispers
text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.

name: Darkbishop Benedictus

name: Darkbishop Benedictus
text: Start of Game: If the spells in your deck are all Shadow, enter Shadowform.

name: Darkest Hour

name: Darkfallen Neophyte

name: Imprisoned Celestial

flavorText: "Look at your deck, now back to me, now back at your deck, now back to me. Who am I? None of your—I'm on a horse."

name: Imprisoned Felmaw
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, attack a random enemy.
flavorText: It doesn't care who woke it up, someone's getting bitten.

name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, equip a 3/2 Axe.
flavorText: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

name: Imprisoned Homunculus
text: Dormant for 2 turns. Taunt
flavorText: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

name: Imprisoned Observer
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Currently serving two turns on charges of aggravated minion slaughter.

name: Imprisoned Phoenix
text: Dormant for 2 turns. Spell Damage +2
flavorText: It's actually pretty easy to escape chains when you can burst into flames.

name: Imprisoned Satyr
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (5).
flavorText: "C'mon down to Illhoof's bargain bin! When the satyr's free, he'll lower your fee!"

name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

name: Imprisoned Sungill
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, summon two 1/1 Murlocs.
flavorText: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

name: Imprisoned Vilefiend
text: Dormant for 2 turns. Rush
flavorText: If you do the time, you gotta make up the time.

name: Improve Morale
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it survives, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: "The beatings will continue until MY morale improves."

name: In Formation!
text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
flavorText: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

name: Inara Stormcrash
text: On your turn, your hero has +2 Attack and Windfury.
flavorText: A fan favorite, Inara is always met with thunderous applause.

name: Incanter's Flow
text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by (1).
flavorText: "Gettin' them discounts in bulk amounts, spells can come, and spells can go, castin' costs drop with my sweet, sweet flow."

name: Incarceration
text: Choose a minion. It goes Dormant for 3 turns.
flavorText: To Blizzard jail with you!

name: Inconspicuous Rider
text: Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck.
flavorText: Improvise, adapt, overcome.

name: Incorporeal Corporal
text: After this minion attacks, destroy it.
flavorText: You won't believe how long this was called "Incorporal Corporeal"…

name: Incriminating Psychic
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Copy a random card from your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Good news: He knows Kazakus's secret identity! Bad news: Now he's here.

name: Infantry Reanimator
text: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly Undead. Give it Reborn.
flavorText: Get a life! Or two!

name: Infected Peasant
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Undead Peasant.
flavorText: The peasants are revolting!

name: Infectious Ghoul
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon an Infectious Ghoul."
flavorText: They call him that because of his laughter! Also his plague.

name: Infectious Sporeling
text: After this damages a minion, turn it into an Infectious Sporeling.
flavorText: "The best thing about being me—there’s so many 'me's."

name: Infest
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
flavorText: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

name: Infested Goblin
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Scarabs with Taunt to your hand.
flavorText: Trust us. DON'T go cheap on the scarab repellent.

name: Infested Tauren
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Slime.
flavorText: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

name: Infested Wolf
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.
flavorText: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

name: Infiltrator Lilian
text: Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
flavorText: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

name: Infinitize the Maxitude
text: Discover a spell. Finale: Return this to your hand at end of turn.
flavorText: When your music is instrumental, it doesn't matter if the words make no sense.

name: Ini Stormcoil
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Mech. Summon a copy of it with Rush, Windfury, and Divine Shield.
flavorText: Before setting her sights on exploration, Ini was known for many inventions, such as the airborne breadmaking dirigible, the hypersprocket 200X zoom binoculars, and jobes (jean robes).

name: Initiation
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
flavorText: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

name: Injured Blademaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
flavorText: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

name: Injured Blademaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
flavorText: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

name: Injured Kvaldir
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavorText: Don't worry. With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

name: Injured Marauder
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavorText: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.

name: Injured Tol'vir
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavorText: Me-OW!

name: Injured Tol'vir
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavorText: Me-OW!

name: Inkmaster Solia
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
flavorText: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

name: Inkveil Ambusher
text: Stealth Has +3 Attack and Immune while attacking.
flavorText: You’ve got it wrong. She releases ink when you’re scared.

name: Inner Demon
text: Give your hero +8 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Critical component of any tragic backstory.

name: Inner Fire
text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavorText: Good idea: Buffing your minions. Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Inner Fire
text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavorText: Good idea: Buffing your minions. Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Inner Rage
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Inner Rage
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavorText: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.
flavorText: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavorText: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Insatiable Devourer
text: Battlecry: Devour an enemy minion and gain its stats. Infuse ( ): And its neighbors.
flavorText: You're not you when you're anima-starved.

name: Insatiable Felhound
text: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +1/+1 and Lifesteal.
flavorText: Back-to-back winner of the annual hot dog eating contest... and the judge-eating contest.

name: Insight
text: Draw a minion. Corrupt: Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavorText: Shouldn't the eyes be facing backwards for insight?

name: Instructor Fireheart
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
flavorText: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

name: Instrument Smasher
text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, equip a random Demon Hunter weapon.
flavorText: Guitar? Nah, she plays percussion.

name: Instrument Tech
text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
flavorText: A tech card without Tradeable? CRINGE.

name: Into the Fray
text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: "You are in my FRAY!"

name: Intrepid Initiate
text: Spellburst: Gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: How you like them apples?

name: Investment Opportunity
text: Draw an Overload card.
flavorText: "It's a real fixer-upper. I mean a REAL fixer upper."

name: Invigorating Sermon
text: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavorText: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

name: Invincible
text: Reborn Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give another random friendly Undead +5/+5 and Taunt.
flavorText: No it's not, I can see it right there.

name: Invitation Courier
text: After a card is added to your hand from another class, copy it.
flavorText: Sending mail via steward is soooo old school.

name: Invocation of Frost
text: Freeze an enemy. Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: Galakrond adores a little frosting.

name: Inzah
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Overload cards cost (1) less.
flavorText: Inzah plays the trumpet, saxophone, piano, guitar, AND bass. No wonder he's always so overloaded!

name: Irebound Brute
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each card drawn this turn.
flavorText: "You don't understand… ogres are an untapped market for vengeance and hatred!"

name: Iron Hide
text: Gain 5 Armor.
flavorText: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

name: Iron Juggernaut
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.
flavorText: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

name: Iron Sensei
text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavorText: Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language. 0110100001101001

name: Ironbark
text: Give a minion +1/+3 and Taunt. Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
flavorText: "The important thing, son, is to protect your spores! I have spoken!"

name: Ironbark Protector
text: Taunt
flavorText: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

name: Ironbark Protector
text: Taunt
flavorText: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

name: Ironbeak Owl
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Ironbeak Owl
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Ironclad
text: Battlecry: If your hero has Armor, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: With one inch of clearance, Ironclad proved ineffective against speedbumps.

name: Irondeep Trogg
text: After your opponent casts a spell, summon another Irondeep Trogg.
flavorText: STOP AGGROING MORE!

name: Ironforge Portal
text: Gain 4 Armor. Summon a random 4-Cost minion.
flavorText: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!

name: Ironforge Rifleman
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

name: Ironforge Rifleman
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

name: Ironfur Grizzly
text: Taunt
flavorText: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

name: Ironfur Grizzly
text: Taunt
flavorText: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

name: Ironhide Direhorn
text: Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Ironhide Runt.
flavorText: "Boy! Bring me my masks and skull rams."

name: Ironwood Golem
text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
flavorText: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

name: Ivory Knight
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavorText: Do NOT call it a "horse".

name: Ivus, the Forest Lord
text: Battlecry: Spend the rest of your Mana and gain +2/+2, Rush, Divine Shield, or Taunt at random for each.
flavorText: He's always welcome at the local tavern, unlike a certain Ancient.

name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

name: JIVE, INSECT!
text: Transform a minion into Ragnaros the Firelord. Overload: (2)
flavorText: "WHY IS NO ONE JIVING? I SPECIFICALLY REQUESTED IT!"

name: Jace Darkweaver
text: Battlecry: Cast all Fel spells you've played this game (targets enemies if possible).
flavorText: As a former mage, making the transition from fire to felfire was quite easy.

name: Jackpot!
text: Add two random spells from other classes that cost (5) or more to your hand.
flavorText: Find someone who looks at you the way Hooktusk looks at loot.

name: Jade Behemoth
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavorText: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

name: Jade Blossom
text: Summon a Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavorText: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.

name: Jade Chieftain
text: Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Give it Taunt.
flavorText: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

name: Jade Claws
text: Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Overload: (1)
flavorText: "Best manicure ever!" - Aya Blackpaw

name: Jade Idol
text: Choose One - Summon a Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.
flavorText: Shuffle or no guts.

name: Jade Lightning
text: Deal 4 damage. Summon a Jade Golem.
flavorText: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

name: Jade Shuriken
text: Deal 2 damage. Combo: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavorText: Good news is, after you remove it from your wound, you can use it to pay your medical bills!

name: Jade Spirit
text: Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavorText: "He's so cute! I just want to squeeze him, then use him for Jade Golem parts!" - Aya Blackpaw

name: Jade Swarmer
text: Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavorText: He's so good at swarming, he can swarm all by himself!

name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
text: Battlecry: If your Hero Power dealt 8 damage this game, summon Ragnaros the Firelord. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

name: Jandice Barov
text: Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies when it takes damage.
flavorText: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

name: Jar Dealer
text: Deathrattle: Add a random 1-Cost minion to your hand.
flavorText: What's in the jar? It could be anyone!

name: Jazz Bass
text: Deathrattle: Your next spell costs ( ) less. (Overload while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: No birds, plural, were harmed in the making of this bass.

name: Jeeves
text: At the end of each player's turn, that player draws until they have 3 cards.
flavorText: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.

name: Jepetto Joybuzz
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
flavorText: “I’m a real toy now!”

name: Jerry Rig Carpenter
text: Battlecry: Draw a Choose One spell and split it.
flavorText: Choose Two – Good; Cheap; or Fast.

name: Jewel of N'Zoth
text: Summon three friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavorText: This coveted gem calls for you to free it… and unleash an inescapable prison.

name: Jeweled Macaw
text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
flavorText: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

name: Jeweled Macaw
text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
flavorText: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

name: Jeweled Scarab
text: Battlecry: Discover a 3-Cost card.
flavorText: It's amazing what you can do with super glue!

name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
text: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health. Overload: (1)
flavorText: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

name: Jitterbug
text: Divine Shield After a friendly character loses Divine Shield, draw a card.
flavorText: The only bug that was intentional.

name: Jolly Roger
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Undead Pirate.
flavorText: That's a great pose, Roger. But this time try happier, and with your mouth open.

name: Journey Below
text: Discover a Deathrattle card.
flavorText: Don't stop believing there's something below.

name: Judgment of Justice
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, set its Attack and Health to 1.
flavorText: Look, we don't need a jury. We've got a paladin right here!

name: Judicious Junior
text: Lifesteal
flavorText: She's judge, jury, and junior!

name: Juicy Psychmelon
text: Draw a 7, 8, 9, and 10-Cost minion from your deck.
flavorText: It's not juicy at all. IT'S JUST MESSING WITH YOUR HEAD.

name: Jumbo Imp
text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavorText: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

name: Jungle Giants
text: Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
flavorText: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

name: Jungle Jammer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random -Cost Beast. (Cast spells while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: When asked what animal they would be, people always say things like "I'd be wolf-lion hybrid mix. King of the jungle, but still sociable and ferocious." No, you'd be a rat.

name: Jungle Moonkin
text: Both players have Spell Damage +2.
flavorText: The REAL angry chicken!

name: Jungle Panther
text: Stealth
flavorText: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

name: Jungle Panther
text: Stealth
flavorText: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

name: Junkbot
text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

name: Jury Duty
text: Summon two Silver Hand Recruits. Give your Silver Hand Recruits +1/+1.
flavorText: The most criminal thing about paladins is that they actually like jury duty.

name: Justicar Trueheart
text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
flavorText: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

name: K'thir Ritualist
text: Taunt Battlecry: Add a random 4-Cost minion to your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Something evil this way comes… and it's bringing friends over!

name: K9-0tron
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a 1-Cost minion, summon it.
flavorText: You merely adopted the Battlegrounds. I was born in it. Molded by it.

name: Kabal Chemist
text: Battlecry: Add a random Potion to your hand.
flavorText: Sure you could have that Polymorph potion, but wouldn't you rather have this mystery potion? It could be anything. Even a Polymorph potion!

name: Kabal Courier
text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage, Priest, or Warlock card.
flavorText: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

name: Kabal Crystal Runner
text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this game.
flavorText: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

name: Kabal Lackey
text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
flavorText: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

name: Kabal Outfitter
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give another random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: Don’t ask her for feathers on your necklace though.

name: Kabal Songstealer
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

name: Kabal Talonpriest
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavorText: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

name: Kabal Trafficker
text: At the end of your turn, add a random Demon to your hand.
flavorText: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

name: Kaboom Bot
text: Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: More Boom for your buck.

name: Kael'thas Sinstrider
text: Every third minion you play each turn costs (0).
flavorText: You heard about Kael'thas? That's messed up, right?

name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
text: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
flavorText: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
flavorText: All that's missing is a little heart.

name: Kangor's Endless Army
text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
flavorText: "That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless." - Countess Ashmore

name: Kangor, Dancing King
text: Lifesteal Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your hand and give it Lifesteal.
flavorText: After Dr. Boom's involvement with the League of EVIL, Kangor cut ties with the Boomsday Labs and began pursuing his true passion - DISCO!!!

name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
text: Your Demons cost (1) less. Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kanrethad Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

name: Kara Kazham!
text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
flavorText: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.

name: Kargal Battlescar
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Lookout for each Watch Post you've summoned this game.
flavorText: One if by land, two if by tree.

name: Kargath Bladefist
text: Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

name: Kathrena Winterwisp
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
flavorText: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

name: Kayn Sunfury
text: Charge All friendly attacks ignore Taunt.
flavorText: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

name: Kayn Sunfury
text: Charge All friendly attacks ignore Taunt.
flavorText: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

name: Kazakus
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, create a custom spell.
flavorText: The mysterious leader of the Kabal is NOT a dragon, and does NOT deal in illegal potions. Any public statements to the contrary will be met with litigation and Dragonfire Potions.

name: Kazakus, Golem Shaper
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, build a custom Golem.
flavorText: With a little love and some tenderness, we’ll CRUSH OUR FOES!

name: Kazakusan
text: Battlecry: If you played 4 other Dragons this game, craft a custom deck of Treasures. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Kazakus had always seemed too clever a sort to bottle a brew that could do him any harm. Perhaps it should come as no surprise, then, that the originator of the Dragonfire Potion was a dragon himself.

name: Keen Reflex
text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. Honorable Kill: Gain +1 Attack this turn.
flavorText: All of Onyxia's whelps were no match for Kurtrus' backflip.

name: Keeneye Spotter
text: Whenever your hero attacks a minion, set its Health to 1.
flavorText: "No Rexxar, not the face, the minion right there. Yep that one righ-- Rexxar no!"

name: Keening Banshee
text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

name: Keeper Stalladris
text: After you cast a Choose One spell, add copies of both choices to your hand.
flavorText: Keeps your choices handy.

name: Keeper of Uldaman
text: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
flavorText: U da man! No, U da man!

name: Keeper of the Grove
text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
flavorText: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

name: Keeper of the Grove
text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
flavorText: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

name: Kel'Thuzad
text: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavorText: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.

name: Kel'Thuzad, the Inevitable
text: Battlecry: Resurrect your Volatile Skeletons. Any that can't fit on the battlefield instantly explode! ( )
flavorText: Looks like Kel'Thuzad is borrowing some of Mr. Bigglesworth's nine lives.

name: Keli'dan the Breaker
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. If drawn this turn, instead destroy all minions except this one.
flavorText: He calms down a lot if you just give him a turn.

name: Keyboard Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, summon two 1/2 Amps with Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Give her a hand, everybody! Or maybe 4!

name: Keymaster Alabaster
text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, add a copy to your hand that costs (1).
flavorText: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

name: Keywarden Ivory
text: Battlecry: Discover a Dual Class spell from any class. Spellburst: Get another copy.
flavorText: She learned exactly one thing from her old man: copying.

name: Kezan Mystic
text: Battlecry: Take control of a random enemy Secret.
flavorText: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.

name: Khadgar

name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone

flavorText: The trolls of old embraced the gift A jewel of black for daggers swift No party lasts who finds the stone Those wielding it soon stand alone.

text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. (Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)

name: Muster for Battle
text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
flavorText: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

name: Mutate

name: Myra Rotspring
text: Battlecry: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Also gain its Deathrattle.

name: Myra's Unstable Element

flavorText: What could go wrong?

name: Myrmidon

flavorText: He didn't have time to Myrmidon the other half of his armor before combat started.

name: Mysterious Blade

name: Mystery Winner
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.

name: N'Zoth's First Mate

name: N'Zoth, God of the Deep

name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor

flavorText: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

name: Naga Corsair
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavorText: Hook-tails are nice and all but she keeps getting stuck on things.

name: Naga Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on spells this game.

name: Naga Sand Witch
text: Battlecry: Change the Cost of spells in your hand to (5).
flavorText: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

name: Naga Sea Witch
text: Your cards cost (5).
flavorText: If she had studied harder, she would have been a C+ witch.

name: Naga's Pride
text: Summon two 2/2 Lionfish. If you played a Naga while holding this, give them +1/+1.

name: Nagrand Slam

name: Nat Pagle
text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavorText: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman! He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

name: Nat Pagle
text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavorText: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman! He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

name: Nat, the Darkfisher
text: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavorText: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

name: Natalie Seline
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.

name: Natural Causes
text: Deal 2 damage. Summon a 2/2 Treant.

name: Naturalize
text: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavorText: Another one bites the dust.

name: Naturalize
text: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavorText: Another one bites the dust.

name: Nature Studies
text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.

name: Naval Mine

name: Necrium Blade

flavorText: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

name: Necromechanic

name: Necrotic Geist

flavorText: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

name: Necrotic Mortician

name: Need for Greed
text: Tradeable Draw 3 cards. If drawn this turn, this costs (3).

name: Nefarian

flavorText: Neptulon, tired of filling hands, is now throwing hands.

name: Nerub'ar Weblord

name: Nerubian Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavorText: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

name: Nerubian Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavorText: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

name: Nerubian Flyer

name: Nerubian Prophet
text: At the start of your turn, reduce this card's Cost by (1).

name: Nerubian Unraveler

name: Nerubian Vizier
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, it costs (2) less.

name: Netherwalker

name: Night Howler

name: Nightblade
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.

name: Nightblade

text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.

name: Nourish
text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.

name: Novice Engineer
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.

name: Nozari
text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.

name: Nozdormu

text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.

name: Oasis Ally
text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental.

name: Oasis Snapjaw
flavorText: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

name: Occult Conjurer

name: Octosari

name: Ogre Brute
text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavorText: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

name: Ogre Magi
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

name: Ogre Magi
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

name: Ogre Ninja
text: Stealth 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavorText: He didn't have the grades to get into ninja school, but his dad pulled some strings.

name: Ogre Warmaul
text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavorText: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

name: Ogremancer
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a 2/2 Skeleton with Taunt.
flavorText: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

name: Oh My Yogg!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, they instead cast a random one of the same Cost.
flavorText: Many wonders lie within, but they are not mere toys when your mind is their plaything.

name: Oil Rig Ambusher
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If this entered your hand this turn, deal 4 instead.
flavorText: Days since last accident: 0

name: Old Murk-Eye
text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
flavorText: He's a legend among murlocs. "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

name: Old Murk-Eye
text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
flavorText: He's a legend among murlocs. "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

name: Omega Agent
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, summon 2 copies of this minion.
flavorText: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

name: Omega Assembly
text: Discover a Mech. If you have 10 Mana Crystals, keep all 3 cards.
flavorText: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

name: Omega Defender
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +10 Attack.
flavorText: "Surrender. You have 10 mana to comply."

name: Omega Devastator
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, deal 10 damage to a minion.
flavorText: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

name: Omega Medic
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore 10 Health to your hero.
flavorText: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

name: Omega Mind
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, your spells have Lifesteal this turn.
flavorText: Has a side-business selling her lipstick shade, "Omega Red."

name: On the Hunt
text: Deal 1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Mastiff.
flavorText: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

name: One-eyed Cheat
text: Whenever you summon a Pirate, gain Stealth.
flavorText: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

name: Onyx Bishop
text: Battlecry: Summon a friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.

name: Onyx Magescribe
text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to your hand.
flavorText: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

name: Onyxia
text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
flavorText: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor. You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

name: Onyxia
text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
flavorText: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor. You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

name: Onyxia the Broodmother
text: At the end of each turn, fill your board with 1/1 Whelps.
flavorText: Throw more dots, throw more dots, more dots, more dots!

name: Onyxian Drake
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your Armor to an enemy minion.
flavorText: The best offense is a great defense.

name: Onyxian Warder
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavorText: Throwing more whelps at the problem might not help, but they certainly will hurt.

name: Oondasta
text: Rush Overkill: Summon a Beast from your hand.
flavorText: Adorning devilsaurs with armor and feathers is a respected job in troll culture, although it has a high turnover rate.

name: Open the Cages

flavorText: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

name: Opera Soloist

name: Optimistic Ogre
text: 50% chance to attack the correct enemy.

name: Oracle of Elune
text: After you play a minion that costs (2) or less, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: Even the moon goddess needs to back up her databases.

name: Order in the Court
text: Reorder your deck from highest Cost to lowest Cost. Draw a card.
flavorText: "I have nothing BUT contempt for this court!"

name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
text: Inspire: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavorText: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

name: Orion, Mansion Manager

name: Ornery Direhorn

name: Ornery Tortoise

name: Outfit Tailor

name: Outrider's Axe

name: Overconfident Orc

name: Overdraft

name: Overdraft
text: Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
flavorText: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

name: Overflow

name: Overgrowth
text: Gain two empty Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Zangarmarsh: it's a fungal out there!

name: Overlord Drakuru

name: Overlord Runthak

flavorText: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

name: Primordial Drake
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Before he became a rap artist.

name: Primordial Drake
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Before he became a rap artist.

name: Primordial Explorer
text: Poisonous Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavorText: "We're letting the poisonous dude carry the bags?"

name: Primordial Glyph
text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavorText: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

name: Primordial Protector
text: Battlecry: Draw your highest Cost spell. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavorText: I thought the "shape of water" meant something else.

name: Primordial Studies
text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavorText: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

name: Primordial Wave
text: Transform enemy minions into ones that cost (1) less and friendly minions into ones that cost (1) more.
flavorText: A primordial hello to you too!

name: Prince Keleseth
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 2-Cost cards, give all minions in your deck +1/+1.
flavorText: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to buff his brothers.

name: Prince Liam
text: Battlecry: Transform all 1-Cost cards in your deck into Legendary minions.
flavorText: "I have a very particular set of skills. Skills that make me a nightmare for witches like you."

name: Prince Malchezaar
text: Start of Game: Add 5 extra Legendary minions to your deck.
flavorText: He was super excited to acquire Gorehowl at a garage sale! Then super disappointed to find out it was a foam reproduction.

name: Prince Renathal
text: Your deck size is 40. Your starting Health is 35.
flavorText: A lot of kids go through a rebellious phase, but Prince Renathal's was a bit extreme.

name: Prince Taldaram
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 3-Cost cards, transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
flavorText: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to copy others.

name: Prince Valanar
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
flavorText: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

name: Princess Huhuran
text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavorText: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

name: Princess Talanji
text: Battlecry: Summon all minions from your hand that didn't start in your deck.
flavorText: Everyone wants to be a princess, but nobody ever considers the size of the hat.

name: Prismatic Elemental
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from any class. It costs (1) less.
flavorText: Disappointed they were rejected from the Magical Guardian tryouts.

name: Prismatic Jewel Kit
text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give minions in your hand +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
flavorText: The divine trick to jewelcrafting is tumbling your own rocks.

name: Prismatic Lens
text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
flavorText: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

name: Private Eye
text: Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck. Combo: Cast 2 instead.
flavorText: Eye see what you did there.

name: Prize Plunderer
text: Combo: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each other card you've played this turn.
flavorText: But he'll never be able to plunder the prize of a happy childhood.

name: Prize Vendor
text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card.
flavorText: He's just making sure they're real. Authentic tickets taste like strawberry.

name: Professor Putricide
text: After you play a Secret, put a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
flavorText: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

name: Professor Slate
text: Your spells are Poisonous.
flavorText: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

name: Promotion
text: Give a Silver Hand Recruit +3/+3 and Taunt.
flavorText: And with the new title of 'Golden Hand Recruit', you also get a pay raise!

name: Prophet Velen
text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
flavorText: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

name: Prophet Velen
text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
flavorText: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

name: Prosecutor Mel'tranix
text: Battlecry: Your opponent can only play their left- and right-most cards on their next turn.
flavorText: "Your Honor. The Defense isn't a clown, he's the whole circus."

name: Prospector's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: Prospectors came from all around in the Golden Legendary Rush of '49.

name: Protect the Innocent
text: Summon a 5/5 Defender with Taunt. If your hero was healed this turn, summon another.
flavorText: "Quick, strike a super hero pose!"

name: Protect the King!
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
flavorText: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!

name: Proud Defender
text: Taunt Has +2 Attack while you have no other minions.
flavorText: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

name: Proving Grounds
text: Summon two minions from your deck. They fight!
flavorText: 1v1 me on Proving Grounds, DH only, no items, 4 stocks.

name: Provoke
text: Tradeable Choose a friendly minion. Enemy minions attack it.
flavorText: "Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. I will crush you!"

name: Psionic Probe
text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavorText: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

name: Psych-o-Tron
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavorText: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

name: Psyche Split
text: Give a minion +1/+2. Summon a copy of it.
flavorText: This is how the arakkoa make friends.

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavorText: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavorText: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Psychic Scream
text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Everybody! Hit the deck!

name: Psychopomp
text: Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
flavorText: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

name: Psyfiend

flavorText: Listens to a LOT of K-pop.

name: Pterrordax Hatchling
text: Battlecry: Adapt.
flavorText: Aww. So cute. Want to feed him another finger?

name: Public Defender
text: Taunt
flavorText: Happy to defend any public offender!

name: Puddlestomper
flavorText: He pays homage to Morgl, the great murloc oracle! (Who doesn't??)

name: Pufferfist
text: After your hero attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: "...and then I'll hit 'em with the ol' puffercut!"

name: Pumpkin Peasant
text: Lifesteal Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
flavorText: Time to squash your opponent.

name: Purify
text: Silence a friendly minion. Draw a card.
flavorText: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!

name: Pursuit of Justice
text: Give +1 Attack to Silver Hand Recruits you summon this game.
flavorText: "Is this about justice or just us?"

name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal 10 damage.
flavorText: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal 10 damage.
flavorText: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal 10 damage.
flavorText: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Pyromaniac
text: Whenever your Hero Power kills a minion, draw a card.
flavorText: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”

name: Pyros
text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).

name: Pyrotechnician
text: After you cast a spell, add a random Fire spell to your hand.

name: Quartermaster
text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2.
flavorText: His specialty? Dividing things into four pieces.

name: Quartz Elemental
text: Can't attack while damaged.
flavorText: These elementals, along with feldspar and mica, are often taken for granite.

name: Queen Azshara
text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, choose an Ancient Relic. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Hobbies include: Ordering subjects around, making deals with old gods, and taking long walks under the beach.

name: Queen of Pain
text: Lifesteal
flavorText: Her sister is the Queen of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

name: Queensguard
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each spell you've cast this turn.
flavorText: Archnemesis of the Guardian of Kings.

name: Questing Adventurer
text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

name: Questing Adventurer
text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

name: Questing Explorer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, draw a card.

name: Quick Shot
text: Deal 3 damage. If your hand is empty, draw a card.
flavorText: Han shot first.

name: Quick Shot
text: Deal 3 damage. If your hand is empty, draw a card.
flavorText: Han shot first.

text: Battlecry: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack this turn.

text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each enemy minion.

name: Rabid Worgen
text: Rush
flavorText: "I'm sorry, son. We had to send Old Howler off…to a farm…to play…"

text: Scan the bottom 5 cards of your deck. Draw any Mechs found this way, then shuffle your deck.

name: Radiance
text: Restore 5 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Because you're worth it!

name: Radiant Elemental
text: Your spells cost (1) less.

text: Summon 1 1/1 (Imp, Imps). (Upgrades each turn!)

text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.

name: Raging Felscreamer
text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
flavorText: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

name: Raging Worgen
text: Has +1 Attack and Windfury while damaged.

name: Raging Worgen
text: Enrage: Windfury and +1 Attack
flavorText: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord. Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.

name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
text: At the end of your turn, restore 8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavorText: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

name: Raid Boss Onyxia
text: Rush. Immune while you control a Whelp. Battlecry: Summon six 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavorText: Onyxia chose her guises to manipulate mortals, but her true form? That was reserved for ending them.

name: Raid Leader
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Raid Leader
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Raid Leader
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

flavorText: "What do you mean by aggressive negotiation tactics?" "Negotiations in bear form."

name: Raid the Docks
text: Questline: Play 3 Pirates. Reward: Draw a weapon.
flavorText: Winning the annual Ratchet Regatta really went to their heads.

name: Raid the Sky Temple
text: Quest: Cast 10 spells. Reward: Ascendant Scroll.
flavorText: "Why can't I hold all these scrolls?"

name: Raiding Party
text: Draw 2 Pirates from your deck. Combo: And a weapon.
flavorText: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

name: Rain of Fire
text: Deal 1 damage to all characters.
flavorText: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

name: Rain of Toads
text: Summon three 2/4 Toads with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavorText: "Oh, THAT'S how she brings the warts!"

text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: She prefers saying that she has Arcane, Fel, Fire, Frost, Holy, Nature, and Shadow Spell Damage +1.

name: Raise Dead
text: Deal 3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.

name: Raj Naz'jan
text: After you cast a spell, deal damage equal to its Cost to the enemy Hero.
flavorText: When you play the Coin, he deals emotional damage.

name: Rake

flavorText: When you're done shredding through your enemies, use it on your leaves!

name: Rally!

flavorText: One for the squire, two for the gnome, three for the glory, and GO, GO, GO!

name: Rallying Blade
text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
flavorText: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

name: Ram Commander
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Rams with Rush to your hand.
flavorText: Get your RAM in pairs for better performance.

name: Ram Tamer

flavorText: Pump up the ram, pump it up. While your hooves are stompin’.

name: Ram Wrangler
text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a random Beast.
flavorText: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

name: Ramkahen Wildtamer
text: Battlecry: Copy a random Beast in your hand.
flavorText: She gets to decide what cards go to the Hall of Fame.

name: Ramming Mount
text: Give a minion +2/+2 and Immune while attacking. When it dies, summon a Ram.
flavorText: Tavish has some road rage issues to work through.

name: Ramming Speed
text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.
flavorText: Her deductible keeps going up.

name: Rampage
text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
flavorText: Minion get ANGRY. Minion SMASH!

name: Rampage
text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
flavorText: Minion get ANGRY. Minion SMASH!

name: Rancor
text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. Gain 2 Armor for each destroyed.
flavorText: Wise men say "Only fools rush in." Wise Orcs say the opposite.

name: Ransack
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If you've played a card from another class this turn, deal 4 instead.
flavorText: "Fred's a talking ghoul. He can do whatever he wants." "I want to steal!"

name: Rapid Fire
text: Twinspell Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: Pew! Pew!

name: Raptor Hatchling
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
flavorText: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

name: Ras Frostwhisper
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
flavorText: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

name: Rat Pack
text: Deathrattle: Summon a number of 1/1 Rats equal to this minion's Attack.
flavorText: He's gonna do it his way.

name: Rat Trap
text: Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 6/6 Rat.
flavorText: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

name: Ratcatcher
text: Rush Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain its Attack and Health.
flavorText: He's on the hunt for Togwaggle's missing rat.

name: Ratchet Privateer
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavorText: There's a fine line between privateering and pirating. It comes down to tax breaks.

name: Rats of Extraordinary Size
text: Summon seven 1/1 Rats. Any that can't fit on the battlefield go to your hand with +4/+4.
flavorText: They don't care if you believe they exist.

name: Rattlegore
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavorText: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

name: Rattling Rascal
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Skeleton. Deathrattle: Summon one for your opponent.
flavorText: Don't give up, skeleton!

name: Ravaging Ghoul
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

name: Ravasaur Runt
text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, Adapt.
flavorText: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

name: Raven Familiar
text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
flavorText: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

name: Raven Idol
text: Choose One - Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.
flavorText: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.

name: Ravencaller
text: Battlecry: Add two random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
flavorText: That Friends and Familiars Plan is really paying off!

name: Ravenholdt Assassin
text: Stealth
flavorText: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold. He'll take care of the rest.

name: Ravenholdt Assassin
text: Stealth
flavorText: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold. He'll take care of the rest.

name: Ravenous Pterrordax
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt twice.
flavorText: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

name: Ray of Frost
text: Twinspell Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, deal 2 damage to it.
flavorText: If you have zero chill, this can help.

name: Raza the Chained
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, your Hero Power costs (0) this game.
flavorText: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

name: Razorboar
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (3) or less from your hand.
flavorText: And this little pig built his house out of VENGEANCE.

name: Razorfen Beastmaster
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (4) or less from your hand.
flavorText: It's a homebrew variant on my favorite role-playing game.

name: Razorfen Hunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Boar.
flavorText: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once. ONCE.

name: Razorfen Hunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Boar.
flavorText: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once. ONCE.

name: Razorfen Rockstar
text: After you gain Armor, gain 2 more.
flavorText: Quilboar feel Rock in their blood. And blood in their rocks.

name: Razorglaive Sentinel
text: After you play the left or right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
flavorText: For the worgen that has everything: more claws.

name: Razormane Battleguard
text: The first Taunt minion you play each turn costs (2) less.
flavorText: Where there's a quill, there's a way.

name: Razormane Raider
text: Frenzy: Attack a random enemy.
flavorText: "Call me hedgehog one more time. I dare you."

name: Razorpetal Lasher
text: Battlecry: Add a Razorpetal to your hand that deals 1 damage.
flavorText: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

name: Razorpetal Volley
text: Add two Razorpetals to your hand that deal 1 damage.
flavorText: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

name: Reaper's Scythe
text: Spellburst: Also damages adjacent minions this turn.
flavorText: Die. Die. Die.

name: Rebuke
text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
flavorText: When one buke just isn’t enough.

name: Reckless Apprentice
text: Battlecry: Fire your Hero Power at all enemies.
flavorText: It’s all a great learning experience until someone accidentally aggros the boss.

name: Reckless Diretroll
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discard your lowest Cost card.
flavorText: "Reck less!? ME WRECK MOAR!"

name: Reckless Experimenter
text: Deathrattle minions you play cost (3) less, but die at the end of the turn.
flavorText: It's hard to call her reckless when it's clear she knows what she's doing.

name: Reckless Flurry
text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
flavorText: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

name: Reckless Rocketeer
text: Charge
flavorText: One Insane Rocketeer. One Rocket full of Explosives. Infinite Fun.

name: Reckless Rocketeer
text: Charge
flavorText: One Insane Rocketeer. One Rocket full of Explosives. Infinite Fun.

name: Recombobulator
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random minion with the same Cost.
flavorText: For when you didn’t combobulate quite right the first time around.

name: Reconnaissance
text: Discover a Deathrattle minion from another class. It costs (2) less.
flavorText: “But Commander, I already did the connaissance.”

flavorText: A Rogue's favorite audio sample is an orchestral stab.

name: Recruiter
text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.

name: Recurring Villain
text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
flavorText: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

name: Recycle
text: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

name: Red Herring
text: Taunt Your non-Red Herring minions have Stealth.
flavorText: He's got gill-ty written all over him!

name: Red Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: It has double the Attack. "Go on." And double the Health. "Yes??" And its trigger has twice the effect. "WHAT???" And it costs… Five times more.

name: Redband Wasp
text: Rush Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: Also comes in other colors, but red's in fashion this season.

name: Redeemed Pariah
text: After you play an Outcast card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "Look at this stick. Look at it!"

name: Redemption
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavorText: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time. It’s a mystery!

name: Redemption
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavorText: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time. It’s a mystery!

name: Redgill Razorjaw
text: Rush
flavorText: One fish, two fish, red fish replaces blue fish.

name: Redscale Dragontamer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavorText: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: Reefwalker
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Piranha Swarmer.
flavorText: A gentle giant with some not-so-gentle friends.

name: Reflecto Engineer
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions in both players' hands.
flavorText: The whole thing's based on the Rubber-Glue Phenomenon.

name: Refreshing Spring Water
text: Draw 2 cards. Refresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.
flavorText: "Mana" is just another name for "electrolytes."

name: Refreshment Vendor
text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to each hero.
flavorText: Menu: Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks. It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

name: Regenerate
text: Restore 3 Health.
flavorText: Finally a cure for degenerates.

name: Regeneratin' Thug
text: At the start of your turn, restore 2 Health to this minion.
flavorText: Regenerates any injury except heartbreak.

name: Reincarnate
text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
flavorText: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.

name: Relentless Pursuit
text: Give your hero +4 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavorText: If you steal a Demon Hunter's corn dog, you'll get what's coming.

name: Relic Vault
text: The next Relic you play this turn casts twice.

name: Relic of Dimensions

name: Repentance
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.

name: Replicating Menace

flavorText: It's a car! *Whomp whomp whomp* It's a robot! *Whomp whom-CRUNCH* It's… three.. smaller robots!

text: Taunt Divine Shield
