flavorText: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

name: The Countess
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 3 Legendary Invitations to your hand.
flavorText: 3 Legendary Invitations, AH AH AH!

name: The Curator
text: Taunt Battlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
flavorText: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.

name: The Dark Portal
text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
flavorText: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

name: The Darkness
text: Starts Dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
flavorText: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

name: The Demon Seed
text: Questline: Take 10 damage on your turns. Reward: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Just need some elbow grease to get this working. Oh, and your soul.

name: The Fires of Zin-Azshari
text: Replace your deck with minions that cost (5) or more. They cost (5).
flavorText: One heck of a hot tub.

name: The Fist of Ra-den
text: After you cast a spell, summon a Legendary minion of that Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
flavorText: The mighty Ra-den was known as the Keeper of Storms. Unfortunately, he could not keep his fist.

name: The Forest's Aid
text: Twinspell Summon five 2/2 Treants.
flavorText: Delicious Forest’s Aid! Made from real forests.

name: The Garden's Grace
text: Give a minion +5/+5 and Divine Shield. Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on Holy spells this game.
flavorText: The perfect place to hold Conchella.

name: The Glass Knight
text: Divine Shield Whenever you restore Health, gain Divine Shield.
flavorText: She seems scary, but she's got a glass jaw.

name: The Harvester of Envy
text: After you play a card copied from the opponent, steal the original.
flavorText: "Ah, permission shmermission! You can borrow anything you want, anytime, as long as if you give it back before it's missed. Everyone knows that! Right?"

name: The Jailer
text: Battlecry: Destroy your deck. For the rest of the game, your minions are Immune.
flavorText: At one point, The Jailer served as Arbiter over the souls of the Shadowlands. He was the epitome of an unbiased, righteous judge of character. WAS.

name: The Last Kaleidosaur
text: Quest: Cast 6 spells on your minions. Reward: Galvadon.
flavorText: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

name: The Leviathan
text: Colossal +1 Rush, Divine Shield After this attacks, Dredge.
flavorText: Built by Ini Stormcoil, this massive vessel can withstand almost anything you put it through... although she would prefer you didn't!

name: The Lich King
text: Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Lich King card to your hand.
flavorText: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

name: The Light! It Burns!
text: Deal damage to a minion equal to its Attack.
flavorText: Wait, if you're over there, then who's messing with the lights?!

name: The Lobotomizer
text: Honorable Kill: Get a copy of the top card of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: This may hurt a little, but don't worry, you won't remember it.

name: The Lurker Below
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, repeat on one of its neighbors.
flavorText: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

name: The Marsh Queen
text: Quest: Play seven 1-Cost minions. Reward: Queen Carnassa.
flavorText: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

name: The Mistcaller
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
flavorText: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great. "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

name: The Nameless One
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
flavorText: Used to be called " , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

name: The One-Amalgam Band
text: Battlecry: Gain a random bonus effect for each minion type you've played this game. ( )
flavorText: Why be good with ONE instrument when you can be terrible with ALL of them!!!

name: The Purator
text: Taunt Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, draw a minion of each minion type.
flavorText: With the rise of the undead, the Curator sees it as his duty to take care of them.

name: The Rat King
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Revive after 5 friendly minions die.
flavorText: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

name: The Runespear
text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
flavorText: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

name: The Scourge
text: Fill your board with random Undead.
flavorText: “You speak of justice? Of cowardice? I will show you the justice of the grave and the true meaning of fear.”

name: The Skeleton Knight
text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
flavorText: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

name: The Soularium
text: Draw 3 cards. At the end of your turn, discard them.
flavorText: Worst field trip ever.

name: The Stonewright
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Totems have +2 Attack.
flavorText: She wrights stone better than she reads it.

name: The Storm Bringer
text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
flavorText: Finally, Electra can work from home.

name: The Sunwell
text: Fill your hand with random spells. Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavorText: The Lich King had extinguished the light of the Sunwell once before - it will take all the might Silvermoon can muster to defend it!

name: The Voraxx
text: After you cast a spell on this minion, summon a 1/1 Plant and cast another copy on it.
flavorText: I am the Voraxx. I speak for the weeds.

name: Theft Accusation
text: Choose a minion. Destroy it after you play a card copied from the opponent.
flavorText: Honey, where are my paaaaaaants?

name: Theotar, the Mad Duke
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in each player's hand and swap them.
flavorText: "I'm afraid you've gone mad! You're entirely bonkers. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best souls are."

name: Thickhide Kodo
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 5 Armor.
flavorText: The introduction of professions was devastating for kodo populations.

name: Thing from Below
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavorText: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

name: Thing from Below
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavorText: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

name: Thistle Tea
text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
flavorText: Aren't Thistles prickly? Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

name: Thori'belore
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Cast a Fire spell to revive Thori'belore! (Revives 2 times.)
flavorText: Mascot of QFC (Quel'Thelas Fried Chicken).

name: Thorngrowth Sentries
text: Summon two 1/2 Turtles with Taunt.
flavorText: Maybe we shouldn't drink from this Oasis…

name: Thornmantle Musician
text: Finale: The next Beast you summon gets +1/+1.
flavorText: She calls the hyena her "little chef". Not sure what that's about.

name: Thoughtsteal
text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavorText: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc? Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Thoughtsteal
text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavorText: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc? Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Thrall, Deathseer
text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
flavorText: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."

name: Thrallmar Farseer
text: Windfury
flavorText: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

name: Thrallmar Farseer
text: Windfury
flavorText: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

name: Thrive in the Shadows
text: Discover a spell from your deck.
flavorText: Why would your spells be afraid of the dark? It's easier to nap there.

name: Throw Glaive
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it dies, add a temporary copy of this to your hand.
flavorText: "No, no, I said SHOW me the glaive!"

name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
text: Inspire: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
flavorText: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating. I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

name: Thunder Lizard
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Adapt.
flavorText: What? THUNDER LIZARD is adapting!

name: Thunderhead
text: After you play a card with Overload, summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush.
flavorText: Most of his friends are still Metalheads.

name: Tickatus
text: Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
flavorText: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

name: Ticket Master
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 Tickets into your deck. When drawn, summon a 3/3 Plush Bear.
flavorText: You can exchange one ticket for a bear or save up thousands for a tacky light-up paperweight!

name: Ticket Scalper
text: Overkill: Draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Takes ten percent off the top.

name: Ticking Abomination
text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your minions.
flavorText: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

name: Tidal Revenant
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage. Gain 8 Armor.
flavorText: A big minion that clears the board and gains Armor? Wow, Warrior is really in their element now.

name: Tidal Surge
text: Lifesteal Deal 4 damage to a minion.
flavorText: Also good for removing pesky stains.

name: Tidal Wave
text: Lifesteal Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavorText: "Hang Four, mon!"

name: Tidelost Burrower
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Murloc, summon a 2/2 copy of it.
flavorText: Burrowing may not be for everyone, but I dig it.

name: Tight-Lipped Witness
text: Secrets can't be revealed.
flavorText: People keep asking for her award-winning vegetarian chili recipe, but she just can't spill the beans.

name: Timber Tambourine
text: Deathrattle: Summon 5/5 (Ancient, Ancients). (Play cards that cost (5) or more while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: Timberine anyone? TIMBERINE!?

name: Timber Wolf
text: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack.
flavorText: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Timber Wolf
text: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack.
flavorText: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Time Out!
text: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.
flavorText: Highly effective against 3 year olds.

name: Time Rip
text: Destroy a minion. Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: "It's time. R.I.P."

name: Timewarden
text: Battlecry: Until the end of your next turn, Dragons you summon gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: When are we getting the Silver, Gold, and Diamond dragonflight?

name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.
flavorText: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

name: Tinkertown Technician
text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, gain +1/+1 and add a Spare Part to your hand.
flavorText: Won't you take me to... Tinkertown?

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
text: Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
flavorText: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
text: Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
flavorText: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

name: Tiny Toys
text: Summon four random 5-Cost minions. Make them 2/2.
flavorText: Mom, they're action figures!

name: Tinyfin's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, draw a Murloc.
flavorText: Movin' right along, mrgl mrg mrgl mrg.

name: Tip the Scales
text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
flavorText: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: To My Side!
text: Summon an Animal Companion, or 2 if your deck has no minions.
flavorText: I hunt alone. Well, me and Misha. And Huffer. And Leokk.

name: To the Front!
text: Your minions cost (2) less this turn (but not less than 1).
flavorText: Except healers. You go to the back.

name: Toad of the Wilds
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Nature spell, gain +2 Health.
flavorText: "Someday we'll find it. The Oasis Connection. The peons, the caravans, and me."

name: Togwaggle's Scheme
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 1 (copy, copies) of it into your deck. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavorText: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

name: Toki, Time-Tinker
text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion from the past to your hand.
flavorText: Just a twist to the left, one quarter turn to the right and … oops! Well, we didn’t need that timeline anyway.

name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

name: Tol'vir Warden
text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
flavorText: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

name: Tomb Guardians
text: Summon two 2/2 Zombies with Taunt. Spend 4 Corpses to give them Reborn.
flavorText: An absolute thriller.

name: Tomb Lurker
text: Battlecry: Add a random Deathrattle minion that died this game to your hand.
flavorText: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

name: Tomb Pillager
text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavorText: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.

name: Tomb Spider
text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast.
flavorText: Less serious than its cousin, the Grave Spider.

name: Tomb Warden
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavorText: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

name: Tome Tampering
text: Shuffle 1-Cost copies of cards in your hand into your deck, then discard your hand.
flavorText: An overdue book calls for a do-over.

name: Tome of Intellect
text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavorText: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.

name: Tony, King of Piracy
text: Both players' decks are swapped. Finale: Draw a card.
flavorText: Tony prefers sailing on torrents rather than streams.

name: Tooth of Nefarian
text: Deal 3 damage. Honorable Kill: Discover a spell from another class.
flavorText: Nefarian: Lord of Blackrock, creator of the chromatic dragonflight, victim of several root canals.

name: Toothy Chest
text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
flavorText: Do you want to eat an adventurer? I want to eat an adventurer!

name: Topior the Shrubbagazzor
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you cast a Nature spell, summon a 3/3 Whelp with Rush.
flavorText: They got a dragon that burns 1000 gallons of anima a week.

name: Topple the Idol
text: Dredge. Reveal it and deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
flavorText: No Old Gods or Kings, only Naga.

name: Topsy Turvy
text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
flavorText: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

name: Torghast Custodian
text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, randomly gain Rush, Divine Shield, or Windfury.
flavorText: Why is it a common? Well we couldn't make it a LEGendary minion!

name: Torrent
text: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Costs (3) less if you cast a spell last turn.
flavorText: Weeks of underwater cross-training have really built up her fourarms.

name: Tortollan Forager
text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
flavorText: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

name: Tortollan Pilgrim
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell in your deck and cast it with random targets.
flavorText: A tortollan made it to the desert!

name: Tortollan Primalist
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
flavorText: I see pizza in my future.

name: Tortollan Shellraiser
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: A hero... In a half-shell.

name: Toshley
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
flavorText: Something about power converters.

name: Totem Cruncher
text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy your Totems. Gain +2/+2 for each destroyed.
flavorText: When regular totem hours won't cut it.

name: Totem Golem
text: Overload: (1)
flavorText: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

name: Totem Goliath
text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems. Overload: (1)
flavorText: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

name: Totemic Evidence
text: Choose a basic Totem and summon it. Infuse ( Totems): Summon all 4 instead.
flavorText: Every totem is evidence of a tree's murder.

name: Totemic Might
text: Give your Totems +2 Health.
flavorText: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Totemic Might
text: Give your Totems +2 Health.
flavorText: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Totemic Reflection
text: Give a minion +2/+2. If it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: "Upon reflection, I have decided that your board needs more ME."

name: Totemic Smash
text: Deal 2 damage. Overkill: Summon a basic Totem.
flavorText: Trolls are the first group to have a totem survive atmospheric re-entry.

name: Totemic Surge
text: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
flavorText: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

name: Touch of the Nathrezim
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it dies, restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

name: Tour Guide
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavorText: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

name: Tour Guide
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavorText: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

name: Tournament Attendee
text: Taunt
flavorText: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament. He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

name: Tournament Medic
text: Inspire: Restore 2 Health to your hero.
flavorText: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

name: Tower Sergeant
text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Best helmet in the valley.

name: Town Crier
text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
flavorText: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

name: Toxfin
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc Poisonous.
flavorText: I'm addicted to him, but I know that he's Toxfin.

name: Toxic Arrow
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.
flavorText: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

name: Toxic Reinforcements
text: Sidequest: Use your Hero Power three times. Reward: Summon three 2/1 Leper Gnomes.
flavorText: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

name: Toxic Sewer Ooze
text: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: When Sergeant Sally shows up unexpectedly, DO NOT FLUSH YOUR MANA CRYSTALS DOWN THE TOILET.

name: Toxicologist
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavorText: Double-majoring in culinary sciences was definitely a mistake.

name: Toxmonger
text: Whenever you play a 1-Cost minion, give it Poisonous.
flavorText: Not all spiders are born poisonous. That's where he comes in.

name: Tracking
text: Discover a card from your deck.
flavorText: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Tracking
text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.
flavorText: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Tracking
text: Discover a card from your deck.
flavorText: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Trade Prince Gallywix
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.
flavorText: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

name: Training Session
text: Discover a Taunt minion. If you play it this turn, repeat this.
flavorText: Instructor Razuvious's training turns the Scourge's Death Knights into hardened killing machines. His merciless routines focus on breaking down his underlings until they build up a resistance to his strength.

name: Trampling Rhino
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavorText: "Whew. I thought you said 'Trampoline Rhino.' Now that would have been scary."

name: Transfer Student
text: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
flavorText: Oh, the places you'll go! There is so much to fight! There are boards to be explored. There are dreams to take flight.

name: Translocation Instructor
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Swap it with a random one in their deck.
flavorText: *Translocates behind you* psssh... nothin personnel, kid.

name: Transmogrifier
text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
flavorText: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

name: Traveling Healer
text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Restore 3 Health.
flavorText: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

name: Traveling Merchant
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion you control.
flavorText: Northrend's greatest export: funnel cakes.

name: Treachery
text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to your opponent.
flavorText: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

name: Treasure Guard
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: The real treasure was the Naga we met along the way.

name: Tree of Life
text: Restore all characters to full Health.
flavorText: Healing: It grows on trees!

name: Treenforcements
text: Choose One - Give a minion +2 Health and Taunt; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavorText: Treemendous value!

name: Treespeaker
text: Battlecry: Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients.
flavorText: Honestly, his delivery is a little wooden.

name: Trench Surveyor
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Mech, draw it.
flavorText: Liquid cooled.

name: Trenchstalker
text: Battlecry: Attack three different random enemies.
flavorText: Cooler heads prevail.

name: Trick Totem
text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
flavorText: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

name: Trinket Tracker
text: Battlecry: Draw a 1-Cost spell.
flavorText: Dashing through the snow On an undead trinket craze Over the hills we go Tracking all the way!

name: Trogg Beastrager
text: Battlecry: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: Still angry that the Gadgetzan Rager Club wouldn't accept him as a member.

name: Trogg Gloomeater
text: Taunt Poisonous
flavorText: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

name: Troggzor the Earthinator
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.
flavorText: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

name: Troll Batrider
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: "Quiet! The bat can't hear where he's goin'!"

name: Troll Centurion
text: Rush. Honorable Kill: Deal 8 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Centurion? Ha, come back when you’re a millennion.

name: Troublemaker
text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
flavorText: "Prepare for trouble!" "Make it double!"

name: Trueaim Crescent
text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
flavorText: You could have just pointed.

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 3 Health to it.
flavorText: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
flavorText: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 3 Health to it.
flavorText: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Tundra Rhino
text: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavorText: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos. Or am I mistaken?

name: Tundra Rhino
text: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavorText: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos. Or am I mistaken?

name: Tunnel Blaster
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavorText: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

name: Tunnel Trogg
text: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
flavorText: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels. You try your beauty routine without natural light.

name: Turalyon, the Tenured
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, set the defender's Attack and Health to 3.
flavorText: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

name: Tuskarr Fisherman
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: If you bring him 500 fish, he'll give you this sweet Kalu'ak Fishing Pole.

name: Tuskarr Jouster
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore 7 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

name: Tuskarr Totemic
text: Battlecry: Summon a random basic Totem.
flavorText: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

name: Tuskarrrr Trawler
text: Battlecry: Dredge.
flavorText: "Fish scales? Junk. A gravestone? Junk. This weird looking puzzle box? Junk. AHA! An Ancharrr!"

name: Tuskpiercer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion.
flavorText: It's the Barrens, everything has tusks! The Quilboar have tusks, the boars have tusks, the tusks have tusks.

name: Twig of the World Tree
text: Deathrattle: Gain 10 Mana Crystals.
flavorText: For druids who want to branch out.

name: Twilight Acolyte
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
flavorText: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

name: Twilight Darkmender
text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore 10 Health to your hero.
flavorText: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

name: Twilight Deceptor
text: Battlecry: If any hero took damage this turn, draw a Shadow spell.
flavorText: Nobody asks questions if you're carrying a clipboard.

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavorText: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavorText: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavorText: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Twilight Elder
text: At the end of your turn, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavorText: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.

name: Twilight Flamecaller
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

name: Twilight Geomancer
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give your C'Thun Taunt (wherever it is).
flavorText: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

name: Twilight Guardian
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavorText: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

name: Twilight Runner
text: Stealth Whenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

name: Twilight Summoner
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Faceless Destroyer.
flavorText: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

name: Twilight Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
flavorText: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.

name: Twilight's Call
text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavorText: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
text: Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
flavorText: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

name: Twin Slice
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Add 'Second Slice' to your hand.
flavorText: The slice so nice, it'll cut you twice.

name: Twin Tyrant
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavorText: They can never agree on whether it's too hot or too cold.

name: Twin-fin Fin Twin
text: Rush. Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavorText: They call him Murloc Joe, winner of the Big M Memorial Surf Off Competition.

name: Twinbow Terrorcoil
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, your next spell casts twice.
flavorText: Two shots. Two kills.

name: Twisted Knowledge
text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
flavorText: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

name: Twisted Tether
text: Destroy a minion. Give its stats to a random Undead in your hand.
flavorText: First, convince your opponent that you just want to play tetherball. Then, you GET 'EM!

name: Twisted Worgen
text: Stealth
flavorText: Sometimes the Old Gods' corruptions gives you power untold, sometimes you get +1 Attack. We can’t all be winners in the Eldritch lottery.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Two-Faced Investor
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a card in your hand by (1). (50% chance to increase.)
flavorText: Should never have opened that joint account...

name: Tyrantus
text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

name: Ultimate Infestation
text: Deal 5 damage. Draw 5 cards. Gain 5 Armor. Summon a 5/5 Ghoul.
flavorText: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

name: Ultrasaur
flavorText: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.

name: Umberwing
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Felwings.
flavorText: Demon Hunters refer to these glaives as "the ol’ flappy-attackys."

name: Umbral Geist
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Shadow spell to your hand.
flavorText: “After all, one can't leave his shadow lying about and not miss it sooner or later, don't you agree?”

name: Umbral Owl
text: Rush Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
flavorText: It sleeps with one eye open.

name: Umbral Skulker
text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, add 3 Coins to your hand.
flavorText: "Three gold?! Do you have any idea how long this quest chain was?"

name: Unbound Elemental
text: After you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

name: Unbound Elemental
text: Whenever you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

name: Underbelly Angler
text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavorText: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

name: Underbelly Fence
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a card from another class, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavorText: She’ll take anything you have—except scruples and a good work ethic.

name: Underbelly Ooze
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

name: Undercity Huckster
text: Deathrattle: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavorText: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

name: Undercity Valiant
text: Combo: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

name: Underking
text: Rush Battlecry and Deathrattle: Gain 6 Armor.
flavorText: "Behold, the Underking! I'm always beneath you, but nothing is beneath me! I hereby declare war on peace and happiness! Soon, all will tremble before me!"

name: Underlight Angling Rod
text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavorText: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

name: Undertaker
text: Whenever you summon a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.

name: Undying Allies
text: After you play an Undead this turn, give it Reborn.
flavorText: Best friends FOREVER.

name: Undying Disciple
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
flavorText: We get it, you're undead. But jumping out of a grave? That's a bit much.

name: Unearthed Raptor
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
flavorText: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.

name: Unending Swarm
text: Resurrect all friendly minions that cost (2) or less.
flavorText: swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm -

name: Unexpected Results
text: Summon two random 2-Cost minions (improved by Spell Damage).
flavorText: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

name: Unholy Frenzy
text: Choose an enemy minion. Your minions attack it. Resummon any that die.
flavorText: GROUP HUG!

name: Unidentified Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavorText: The terms of service are constantly changing.

name: Unidentified Elixir
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavorText: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

name: Unidentified Maul
text: Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavorText: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

name: Unidentified Shield
text: Gain 5 Armor. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavorText: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

name: Unite the Murlocs
text: Quest: Summon 10 Murlocs. Reward: Megafin.
flavorText: Form feet and legs! Form arms and body! Oh. Sorry. I was thinking about Mechafin.

name: Unleash Fel
text: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Manathirst (6): With Lifesteal.
flavorText: Why'd you put it on a leash in the first place?

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Twinspell Summon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
flavorText: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

name: Unleash the Hounds
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavorText: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Unleash the Hounds
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavorText: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Unlicensed Apothecary
text: After you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

name: Unliving Champion
text: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, summon two 3/2 Zombies.
flavorText: Unlive a little!

name: Unpopular Has-Been
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 5-Cost minion from the past.
flavorText: Oh man, she used to rock more than ANYONE back in the Year of the Kraken. I wish I could've seen her perform back then…

name: Unpowered Mauler
text: Can only attack if you cast a spell this turn.
flavorText: After a stressful work day it really needs an outlet.

name: Unpowered Steambot
text: Taunt
flavorText: Overpowered Steambot got nerfed.

name: Unseal the Vault
text: Quest: Summon 20 minions. Reward: Pharaoh's Warmask.
flavorText: "Huh... That's a nice card back."

name: Unseen Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

name: Unsleeping Soul
text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavorText: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: Unstable Evolution
text: Echo Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
flavorText: They grow up so fast.

name: Unstable Felbolt
text: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion and a random friendly one.
flavorText: Warning! Your minions are seated in the splash zone.

name: Unstable Ghoul
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.

name: Unstable Portal
text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
flavorText: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals. We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

name: Unstable Shadow Blast
text: Deal 6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits your hero.
flavorText: "Unstable" usually means "awesome!"

name: Untamed Beastmaster
text: Whenever you draw a Beast, give it +2/+2.
flavorText: All it takes is a tummy rub.

name: Untapped Potential
text: Quest: End 4 turns with any unspent Mana. Reward: Ossirian Tear.
flavorText: The official term is "strategic laziness."

name: Unwilling Sacrifice
text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

name: Upgrade!
text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavorText: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Upgrade!
text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavorText: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Upgradeable Framebot
flavorText: *Awesome arm not included.

name: Upgraded Repair Bot
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +4 Health.
flavorText: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

name: Ur'zul Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: Nothing personal, tiny human. I have many mouths to feed.

name: Ur'zul Horror
text: Deathrattle: Add a 2/1 Lost Soul to your hand.
flavorText: You face face face face face Jaraxxus!

name: Urchin Spines
text: Your spells this turn are Poisonous.
flavorText: I shouldn't have licked that.

name: Ursatron
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Mech from your deck.
flavorText: It's been programmed to include all the bear necessities.

name: Usher of Souls
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavorText: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
flavorText: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.
flavorText: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

name: Val'anyr
text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
flavorText: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavorText: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

name: Valdris Felgorge
text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
flavorText: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

name: Valeera the Hollow
text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
flavorText: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."

name: Validated Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.
flavorText: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But… he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

name: Vampiric Blood
text: Give your hero +5 Health. Spend 3 Corpses to gain 5 more and draw a card.
flavorText: BLEH, BLEH BLEH!

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Vanndar Stormpike
text: Battlecry: If this costs less than every minion in your deck, reduce their Cost by (3).
flavorText: His favorite modes of transportation? Van, car, board, bike.

name: Vaporize
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavorText: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card. We may never know the truth.

name: Vaporize
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavorText: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card. We may never know the truth.

name: Varden Dawngrasp
text: Battlecry: Freeze all enemy minions. If any are already Frozen, deal 4 damage to them instead.
flavorText: Varden Dawngrasp could wield fire, summon hailstorms, and morph a night elf into a sheep with a snap of their fingers. Knowing how malleable reality could be, certain labels felt downright trivial.

name: Varian Wrynn
text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
flavorText: Leader of the Alliance! Father of Anduin! Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

name: Varian, King of Stormwind
text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion to gain Rush. Repeat for Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: Man, this guy is so cool. Sure hope nothing happens to him.

name: Vast Wisdom
text: Discover two spells that cost (3) or less. Swap their Costs.
flavorText: My wisdom is SO vast that I can count up to THREE!

name: Vectus
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
flavorText: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

name: Veiled Worshipper
text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, draw 3 cards.
flavorText: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

name: Velen's Chosen
text: Give a minion +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

name: Vendetta
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
flavorText: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

name: Vengeful Spirit
text: Outcast: Draw 2 Deathrattle minions.
flavorText: Sheesh, even the spirits are edgy when it comes to Demon Hunters.

name: Vengeful Visage
text: Secret: After an enemy minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it to attack the enemy hero.
flavorText: The mirror shows us nothing less than the deepest, darkest desire of our hearts: to go face.

name: Vengeful Walloper
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each Outcast card you've played this game.
flavorText: If you can't beat 'em, beat WITH 'em!

name: Venomancer
text: Poisonous
flavorText: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

name: Venomizer
text: Magnetic Poisonous
flavorText: Keeps getting banned for toxic behavior.

name: Venomous Scorpid
text: Poisonous Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: Despite what Guff says, he is NOT a "nice little guy."

name: Venomstrike Bow
text: Poisonous
flavorText: "You know you only have to coat the arrowhead in poison and not the entire bow, right?"

name: Venomstrike Trap
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3 Poisonous Cobra.
flavorText: Snakes on a frozen plain.

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
text: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavorText: No Job is too big. No fee is too big.

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
text: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavorText: No Job is too big. No fee is too big.

name: Veranus
text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavorText: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

name: Verdant Longneck
text: Battlecry: Adapt.
flavorText: Always sticking its neck into other people’s business.

name: Vereesa Windrunner
text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
flavorText: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

name: Verse Riff
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor. Finale: Play your last Riff.
flavorText: Well anyways, here's Worgen Wall.

name: Vessina
text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

name: Veteran Warmedic
text: After you cast a Holy spell, summon a 2/2 Medic with Lifesteal.
flavorText: In times of war, warmedics bring their own medics.

name: Vex Crow
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavorText: As birds of ill omen, these crows often summon Doomsayers.

name: Vexallus
text: Your Arcane spells cast twice.
flavorText: He only casts the spells once - it's Shmexallus that casts the copy.

name: Vibrant Squirrel
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acorns into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/1 Squirrel.
flavorText: Oh, they're cute now. Just wait till they unleash a Savage Roar.

name: Vicious Bloodworm
text: Battlecry: Give a minion in your hand Attack equal to this minion's Attack.
flavorText: Not to be confused with the Viscous Bloodworm.

name: Vicious Fledgling
text: After this minion attacks a hero, Adapt.
flavorText: A youngster who is truly hungry for self-improvement.

name: Vicious Scalehide
text: Lifesteal Rush
flavorText: They make wonderful pets if you're not allergic to blood loss.

name: Vicious Scraphound
text: Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavorText: It begs for scraps.

name: Vicious Slitherspear
text: After you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack until your next turn.
flavorText: He goes by ‘Fun-Loving Slitherspear’ on his dating profile.

name: Vile Apothecary
text: At the end of your turn, add a random Concoction to your hand.
flavorText: When he's feeling extra malicious, he uses the licorice-flavored one.

name: Vile Call
text: Summon two 2/2 Demons with Lifesteal.
flavorText: "We're calling to inform you that your vehicle's insurance is about to expire."

name: Vile Library
text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1 for each Imp you control.
flavorText: What type of vial library has 0 vials in it!?

name: Vilebrood Skitterer
text: Poisonous Rush
flavorText: It aspires to be a Vilebrood Dancer, but it has eight left feet.

name: Vilefiend
text: Lifesteal
flavorText: Dreamed of becoming a Stylefiend, but fel was never in season.

name: Vilefiend Trainer
text: Outcast: Summon two 1/1 Demons.
flavorText: My Vilefiend Trainers give me a much better sprint than my Air Gul'dans.

name: Vilefin Inquisitor
text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'
flavorText: Nobody expects the Vilefin Inquisition!

name: Vilespine Slayer
text: Combo: Destroy a minion.
flavorText: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

name: Vinecleaver
text: After your hero attacks, summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavorText: George and Karl! Thank the Light we found you!

name: Violet Haze
text: Add 2 random Deathrattle cards to your hand.
flavorText: Elite Tauren Chieftain's next hit single.

name: Violet Illusionist
text: During your turn, your hero is Immune.
flavorText: She’s much more cheerful after losing the ‘n’ in her name.

name: Violet Spellsword
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each spell in your hand.
flavorText: If you have to wield a spell and a sword, then neither is performing to expectation.

name: Violet Spellwing
text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to your hand.
flavorText: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavorText: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig. And then you get your name on the board.

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavorText: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig. And then you get your name on the board.

name: Violet Warden
text: Taunt Spell Damage +1
flavorText: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

name: Violet Wurm
text: Deathrattle: Summon seven 1/1 Grubs.
flavorText: It's wurms all the way down.

name: Virmen Sensei
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2.
flavorText: There is no carrot.

name: Vitality Surge
text: Draw a minion. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavorText: If your vitality lasts longer than four hours, consult a Priest.

name: Vitality Totem
text: At the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

name: Vivid Nightmare
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it with 1 Health remaining.
flavorText: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

name: Vivid Spores
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavorText: Hey man, I just feel like... death is just a construct of our imaginations, ya know?

name: Void Analyst
text: Deathrattle: Give all Demons in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: Conclusion: Nothing there.

name: Void Contract
text: Destroy half of each player's deck.
flavorText: “YOU SIGNED WHAT?!”

name: Void Crusher
text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
flavorText: We like to call him "Wesley".

name: Void Drinker
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to gain +3/+3.
flavorText: It has no taste.

name: Void Flayer
text: Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: The Void, just like onions, has flayers.

name: Void Ripper
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all other minions.
flavorText: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

name: Void Shard
text: Lifesteal Deal 4 damage.
flavorText: Light's easy. Void's hard.

name: Void Terror
text: Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
flavorText: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Void Terror
text: Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.

name: Wrath
text: Choose One - Deal 3 damage to a minion; or 1 damage and draw a card.
flavorText: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

name: Wrathguard
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
flavorText: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

name: Wrathion
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
flavorText: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon. Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask? WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

name: Wrathscale Naga
text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: If throwing glaives is what you crave; summon tokens and make 'em broken.

name: Wrathscale Naga
text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: If throwing glaives is what you crave; summon tokens and make 'em broken.

name: Wrathspike Brute
text: Taunt After this is attacked, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: You scratch her back, her back scratches back.

name: Wrathspine Enchanter
text: Battlecry: Cast a copy of a Fire, Frost, and Nature spell in your hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: If he could see, he might be better at targeting.

name: Wrenchcalibur
text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

name: Wretched Exile
text: After you play an Outcast card, add a random Outcast card to your hand.
flavorText: If you're cold, they're cold. Let your wretches inside.

name: Wretched Reclaimer
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion, then return it to life with full Health.
flavorText: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

name: Wretched Tiller
text: Whenever this minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: If you ever tried to plow permafrost, you’d be wretched, too.

name: Wretched Tutor
text: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

name: Wriggling Horror
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
flavorText: Created to scare. Born to wriggle.

name: Wyrm Weaver
text: Spellburst: Summon two 1/2 Mana Wyrms.
flavorText: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

name: Wyrmguard
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavorText: They think they're trusted guardians. Dragons think they're convenient snacks.

name: Wyrmrest Agent
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavorText: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority 1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

name: Wyrmrest Purifier
text: Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random cards from your class.
flavorText: She keeps your deck classy.

name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
flavorText: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

name: Xavius
text: After you play a card, summon a 2/1 Satyr.
flavorText: Xavius has grand nightmares of summoning Sargeras into this world, but a few Satyr will have to do for now.

name: Xhilag of the Abyss
text: Colossal +4 At the start of your turn, increase the damage of Xhilag's Stalks by 1.
flavorText: When ancient heroes drove a felhunter into the sea, they thought it was the end. But for Xhilag, it was only the beginning...

name: Xyrella
text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, deal that much damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: On the Night of Falling Stars, Xyrella had a vision of a shattered naaru. "Go to the Barrens," the being said. "Seek the shards of my broken body. Restore me, and I will restore your daughter."

name: Xyrella, the Devout
text: Battlecry: Trigger the Deathrattle of every friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: Xyrella thought she was only saving her daughter. Her actions may very well have saved the entire world.

name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
flavorText: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

name: Y'Shaarj, the Defiler
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each Corrupted card you've played this game to your hand. They cost (0) this turn.
flavorText: Y'Shaarj made an excellent office intern, doing the copying AND defiling.

name: Ymirjar Deathbringer
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Spend 3 Corpses to summon a 3/3 Risen Ymirjar with Taunt.
flavorText: Purple cotton candy is the snack of choice in Ymirheim.

name: Ymirjar Frostbreaker
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each Frost spell in your hand.
flavorText: Also gains +1 Attack for each time your opponent mispronounces his name.

name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

name: Yogg-Saron, Master of Fate
text: Battlecry: If you've cast 10 spells this game, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Yogg take the wheel!

name: Yoink!
text: Discover a Hero Power and set its Cost to (0). Swap back after 2 uses.
flavorText: Saying the spell’s name makes it work better.

name: Young Dragonhawk
text: Windfury
flavorText: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

name: Young Dragonhawk
text: Windfury
flavorText: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

name: Young Priestess
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavorText: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

name: Young Priestess
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavorText: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

name: Youthful Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavorText: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews. Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

name: Youthful Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavorText: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews. Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

name: Youthful Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavorText: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews. Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.
flavorText: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream. Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.
flavorText: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream. Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Ysera the Dreamer
text: Battlecry: Add one of each Dream card to your hand.
flavorText: Quick! Quick! Write it down before you forget them all!

name: Ysera, Unleashed
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 7 Dream Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a random Dragon.
flavorText: Releash the Dragon!

name: Ysiel Windsinger
text: Your spells cost (1).
flavorText: Reach down into your lungs. The wind that resides there is your greatest treasure. It provides the gift of song, which is free. *But not less than (1)

name: ZOMBEEEES!!!
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon four 1/1 Zombees to attack it.
flavorText: In your brain, in your brain, Zombees, Zombees, Zombees-ees-ees.

name: Za'qul
text: Your Abyssal Curses heal you for the damage they deal. Battlecry: Give your opponent an Abyssal Curse.
flavorText: Everything’s going exzaq’ully to plan.

name: Zai, the Incredible
text: Battlecry: Copy the left- and right-most cards in your hand.
flavorText: Following this act will be her younger brother, Frank the Mediocre.

name: Zandalari Templar
text: Battlecry: If you've restored 10 Health this game, gain +4/+4 and Taunt. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: YOU WERE A TEMPLAR, JONDAR!

name: Zap!
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavorText: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

name: Zap!
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavorText: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

name: Zayle, Shadow Cloak
text: You start the game with one of Zayle's EVIL Decks!
flavorText: E.V.I.L. is the new black.

name: Zealous Initiate
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

name: Zentimo
text: Whenever you target a minion with a spell, cast it again on its neighbors.
flavorText: Serenity. Peace. Many frogs.

name: Zephrys the Great
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, wish for the perfect card.
flavorText: "Of course it's perfect, you're just not seeing how to use it."

name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
text: Summon a 1/1 copy of each minion in your deck.
flavorText: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

name: Zerek, Master Cloner
text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
flavorText: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

name: Zilliax
text: Magnetic Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal, Rush
flavorText: Everything but the kitchen sink. Oh wait, there's one on his back.

name: Zilliax
text: Magnetic Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal, Rush
flavorText: Everything but the kitchen sink. Oh wait, there's one on his back.

name: Zixor, Apex Predator
text: Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Zixor Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: A living terror. Teleports at will. Feasts on tainted helboar meat. No head scritches unless you're Leoroxx.

name: Zok Fogsnout
text: Battlecry: Summon two / Quilboar with Taunt. (Improved by your hero Attack & Armor gained this turn!)
flavorText: Despite having only 3 digits on each hand, Zok plays Bass like he has 5.

name: Zola the Gorgon
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
flavorText: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

name: Zola the Gorgon
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
flavorText: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

name: Zombie Chow
text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Zombie. It's what's for dinner.

name: Zoobot
text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +1/+1.
flavorText: The Murloc is taking the picture.

name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon three random 1-Cost minions for your opponent.
flavorText: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

name: Zul'jin
text: Battlecry: Cast all spells you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: If you can dodge an axe, you can dodge a ball.

name: Zzeraku the Warped
text: Whenever your hero takes damage, summon a 6/6 Nether Drake.
flavorText: The extra Z is for "zesty."
